version_description:
Updates:
Fix a mior bug.
We also made a beautiful unicorn icon, hope you like it!

Updates:
Fix a mior bug.
We also made a beautiful unicorn icon, hope you like it!

The chests can be unlocked sooner!
If you only need some small amount of coins or time to unlock a chest, now you can unlock it after watching a fun video.

Meanwhile, we also fixed an issue about cloud save.

The chests can be unlocked sooner!
If you only need some small amount of coins or time to unlock a chest, now you can unlock it after watching a fun video.

Meanwhile, we also fixed an issue about cloud save.
Added a free revive chance! Go further and enjoy!
Added a free revive chance! Go further and enjoy!
Optimized the performance and it's even faster now.
Optimized the performance and it's even faster now.
Fixed some tiny issues
Fixed some tiny issues

Day & Night cycle added!
The rising sun and moon shall see your adventure in this world.
Charge forward and slay orks in the daytime;
Sneak on and watch your steps when nights gather;
Jump and dash with the breaking dawn on your shoulders and feel like a Hero!

Haptic feedback and forcetouch were also added!
And some cool helmets to unlock!

Day & Night cycle added!
The rising sun and moon shall see your adventure in this world.
Charge forward and slay orks in the daytime;
Sneak on and watch your steps when nights gather;
Jump and dash with the breaking dawn on your shoulders and feel like a Hero!

Haptic feedback and forcetouch were also added!
And some cool helmets to unlock!

Fixed some tiny issues
and added a switch for haptic feedback

Fixed some tiny issues
and added a switch for haptic feedback
Minor Bug Fix
Minor Bug Fix
Game Optimization
Game Optimization

Boo! Stock up with clean panties, because we have prepared for you a terribly exciting Halloween update!

- Ghostland - new adventure await for you in Portal. Fight with ghosts and don’t let the Reaper catch you!
- 4 new helmets are waiting until you find them in a Ghost Chest
- Scythe and Stakegun - new weapons that will help you to slain the evil.

Minor Bug Fix
Minor Bug Fix

Welcome to the Ice-Land!
- DownHill - New advanture with a brand new gameplay - Skiing! Come to the portal and slide down on a snow mountain!
- 4 New Winter helmets:Reindeer,Ploar Bear,White Wolf and Goaltender with new weapons!
- New Winter Pack: Contains exclusive helmet "Ice Knight" and other cool stuffs!
Happy Winter day!

Welcome to the Ice-Land!
- DownHill - New advanture with a brand new gameplay - Skiing! Come to the portal and slide down on a snow mountain!
- 4 New Winter helmets:Reindeer,Ploar Bear,White Wolf and Goaltender with new weapons!
- New Winter Pack: Contains exclusive helmet "Ice Knight" and other cool stuffs!
Happy Winter day!

Heros, wishing you good fortune and wealth on the 2019 Year of pig!

【Chinese Lunar New Year Update】
- 2 new Chinese helmets: Dancing lion and Chinese dragon
- Celebrate and enjoy the beautiful Chinese lanterns on the map!

【Introducing the Tournament Update】
Getting ready to join a tournament feasta!Compete with other players all over the world!Win trophy cups and redeem for a tournament chest with exclusive helmets and awesome weapons!

【How to participate?】
- New tournament goal refresh every 24 hours,complete it as much as you can to get a better rank and earn more trophy cups!
- You will receive trophy cups base on how much you have completed for that goal
- Top 3 rank of the tournament will receive big prize:150/125/100 trophy cups,be sure to check you rank before the tournament ends!
- Redeem a tournament chest for every 100 trophy cups and get your reward!

【Introducing the Tournament Update】
Get ready to join to updated tournaments!
Compete with other players all over the world! Win trophy cups and redeem for a tournament chest with exclusive helmets and awesome weapons!

- Meet the new follower: Monkey Frank!
- Sheeps mechanics was updated.
- Ork’s exclamations replaced with emojis.
- A lots of other improvements in graphics and sounds you can find in this update.

[High grass]
Get ready to play in a high grass. Is it a treasure or an ork in there?
Cut the grass with weapons to discover!

[Knight’s Order Membership]
Get a weekly subscription and receive:
- Angel, who brings down spears of light upon your enemies
- 200 crowns every day
- Ads free gameplay
-Minor bug fixed

Spooky! Are you ready for Halloween?

-New Halloween theme helmets added: Jack, Vampire, Undead;
-New Follower Reappy: Find this cool follower just in Ghostland adventure!
-New monster in Ghostland;
-Special scene just for Halloween;
-Limited-time offer for Halloween pack!

Have fun for Halloween!

- NEW DAILY CHECK-IN: Come back to the game and get Epic rewards!
- NEW UPGRADE SYSTEM: Now you can upgrade your favorite helmets and get much stronger!
-NEW HELMETS: We've made brand new helms for you to collect. Come and get them!

Stay tuned for our next update!

- NEW DAILY CHECK-IN: Come back to the game and get Epic rewards!
- NEW UPGRADE SYSTEM: Now you can upgrade your favorite helmets and get much stronger!
-NEW HELMETS: We've made brand new helms for you to collect. Come and get them!

Stay tuned for our next update!

We’ve prepared great update for you!

- New Adventure: Jotunheim! Gather your viking army and protect your land!
- Brand New Enemies: defeat Jotuns, north trolls and ice skeletons!
- New Follower: Vikings pack, save them in the new adventure!
- New Helmets: Loki, Jotun, Drakar
-Happy New Year, come and try out our Red Envelope Event!

Ready for your Halloween Adventure?

-Updated map: Double Floors! Right now you can climb up easlier and defeat orks on different floors!
-New Halloween Packs: Special seasonal skin will be soon available for you: Ghost Knight, Ghost Bat, Ghost Reaper and Ghost Dragon; Collect them all in the Halloween Portal!
-Halloween Packs coming soon!
-New changes for packs: Now you can also watch video to get them!
